Topic.Title: Requesting Beta Testers for Browser Game

Posts.EditableText:
I'm in the market for beta testers who'd be willing to give me feedback on a new browser-based text adventure. I hope to enter it in this year's IFComp, so I'd like to keep testing private for now.

In "Redstone" you play a reservation deputy investigating a murder at a casino. This is my first release using an experimental new graphical interface. The game uses a parser in the background, but instead of typing, the user selects words to build commands.

If you're interested, please email admin at gamefic.com for a link or post here with contact information. Thanks!
Posts.HTML:

In "Redstone" you play a reservation deputy investigating a murder at a casino. This is my first release using an experimental new graphical interface. The game uses a parser in the background, but instead of typing, the user selects words to build commands.

If you're interested, please email admin at gamefic.com for a link or post here with contact information. Thanks!
